name: G.G Series SUPER HERO OGRE
synopsis: Charge up your Superhero Attacks and be a super cool superhero! An evil army is on the march! Confront them and save the day in this superhero fighting action game. Each time you defeat an enemy with a Hero Attack, your Hero Gauge goes up. Then, with simple button commands, you can use the charged-up Hero Gauge to unleash powerful Superhero Attacks on your foes. Continue to land Hero Attacks to keep the Hero Gauge charged and perform a devastating chain of Superhero Attacks. After you destroy the lesser enemies, a boss will appear. Defeat it to clear the level.
